org.cyclops.cyclopscore.helper

Class MinecraftHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.helper.MinecraftHelpers

  • public class MinecraftHelpers
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains helper methods for various minecraft specific things.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MinecraftHelpers.NBTTag_Types
      The types of NBT Tags, used for the second parameter in NBTTagCompound.getTagList(String, int).

        public static void setDay(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                          boolean toDay)
        Set the world time to day or night.
        Parameters:
        world - the world to manipulate time in.
        toDay - if true, set to day, otherwise to night.
